Package cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.persistence

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StatePersistable
    State persistable object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileXmlStatePersistor
    Persists state into XML file.
    FileXmlStateRestorer
    Restore state from XML file.
    NullStatePersistenceLogger
    Dummy implementation of StatePersistenceLogger.
    SimplePersistenceMessage
    Persistence log message.
    SimpleStatePersistenceLogger
    String persistence logger.
    StatePersistableAttribute
    Persisted attribute (key-value).
    StatePersistableElement
    State persisted element.
    StatePersistenceLogger
    State persistence logger - logging information during state persisting or restoring.
    StatePersistor<T>
    Allows persisting StatePersistable objects.
    StateRestorer<T>
    Allows restoring StatePersistable objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidPersistedStateException
    Invalid persisted state (unknown, missing, invalid parameters or elements)
